remarks: Hilbert space scalar multiplication distributive law.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Sep-2007.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
hldi.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
hldi.2 $e |- G = ( +v ` U ) $.
hldi.4 $e |- S = ( .sOLD ` U ) $.
hldi $p |- ( ( U e. CHilOLD /\ ( A e. CC /\ B e. X /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( A S ( B G C ) ) = ( ( A S B ) G ( A S C ) ) ) $.
